name: Forest Animal Hunting 3D
description:
You enter in to a hunting adventure in a dangerous forest to hunt down your favorite and loving animals with your sniper shooting gun. These wild animals are facing and watching any human first time in their lives so take the aim & shoot at them instead of being hurt from them.

This adventure & action game provides you a platform which you might not been able to get in your real life; make the animals senseless and help medical staff to treat these endangered species of nature.

This game is unique from other shooting games, hunting games and wild animals hunting games in a sense that you are facing the challenge of saving endangered animals on earth to make them senseless so that veterinary specialists can inspect them for medical treatment.

This game tests your energies, temper, courage and how good you are in accepting the challenge.
